docs.snippet: Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Field 3d of Pittsfield and Wilmington, N. Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Miss Katharine Gardner Field, to HerbertJoachimSchmidt 3d, son of Mr. and Mrs. Herbert Jurgen Schmidt of Richmond, Minn....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. and Mrs. Samuel Field 3d of Pittsfield and Wilmington, N. Y., have announced the engagement of their daughter, Miss Katharine Gardner Field, to HerbertJoachimSchmidt 3d, son of Mr. and Mrs. Herbert Jurgen Schmidt of Richmond, Minn.

headline.main: Miss Field Is Fiancee of H. J. Schmidt 3d

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: A Federal judge decided today to recommend a special threejudge panel to review a novel court suit in which the controversial State Consumer Health Director, Dr. Oscar Sussman, has charged that his superiors tried to muzzle him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Federal judge decided today to recommend a special threejudge panel to review a novel court suit in which the controversial State Consumer Health Director, Dr. Oscar Sussman, has charged that his superiors tried to muzzle him.
docs.abstract: Fed Judge Clarkson S Fisher recommends special 3-judge panel rev novel ct suit in which controversial NJ Consumer Health Comr Oscar Sussman has charged that his superiors tried to restrict his public statements; says suit raises const questions about freedom of speech for public officials that should not be settled by 1 judge; Sussman became center of controversy in '73 when he charged that NJ failed to move swiftly in cleaning up unsanitary kitchens in public insts; he ordered insts shut down on ground that they were filthy, touching off feud with Comr James R Cowan and former Atty Gen George F Kugler Jr (S)

headline.main: SUSSMAN SUIT GOING TO A 3-JUDGE PANEL

docs.snippet: Shuffling into his defensive assignment not long ago, Ernie DiGregorio pointed at Calvin Murphy of the Houston Rockets and shouted: "I got the little one." Murphy, whose height is listed at 5 feet 9 inches, growled at what he considered an insult....
docs.lead_paragraph: Shuffling into his defensive assignment not long ago, Ernie DiGregorio pointed at Calvin Murphy of the Houston Rockets and shouted: "I got the little one." Murphy, whose height is listed at 5 feet 9 inches, growled at what he considered an insult. Ernie D had to laugh. docs.snippet: In what appears to be the first serious split among anti-Marxists in Chile since the downfall of the Marxist government, the country's largest party has accused the ruling military junta of violating human rights, mistreating the working class and...
docs.lead_paragraph: In what appears to be the first serious split among anti-Marxists in Chile since the downfall of the Marxist government, the country's largest party has accused the ruling military junta of violating human rights, mistreating the working class and trying to suppress all politicalparty activity.

headline.main: CHILE'S BIG PARTY CRITICIZES JUNTA; Christian Democrats Charge Violation of Human Rights and Political Suppression

docs.snippet: The Boston Celtics, down by 17 points in the second quarter, rallied tonight for a 105-104 National Basketball Association victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on two free throws apiece by Don Chaney and John Havlicek in the last 42 seconds. Dave Cowe...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics, down by 17 points in the second quarter, rallied tonight for a 105-104 National Basketball Association victory over the Milwaukee Bucks on two free throws apiece by Don Chaney and John Havlicek in the last 42 seconds. Dave Cowens scored 12 of his 28 points in the fourth quarter to spark the Celtics,

headline.main: Celtic Rally Beats Bucks By 105-104; Hawks Defeat Lakers

docs.snippet: Weavers visiting the city are often irresistibly attracted to the School Products Company, with its profusion of vivid yarns and the aroma of fleece. The company, at 312 East 23d Street, has looms set up in its fifth floor showroom to exhibit work...
docs.lead_paragraph: Weavers visiting the city are often irresistibly attracted to the School Products Company, with its profusion of vivid yarns and the aroma of fleece. The company, at 312 East 23d Street, has looms set up in its fifth floor showroom to exhibit work in progress. And looms have been the basic business here for 25 years.

headline.main: A Mecca for Weavers and Spinners; SHOP TALK
